website_summaries.verdict: These bamboo liners are beautifully soft, fit just about any size and type of cloth diaper, and are slightly less bulky than others.
pros: Features four layers of bamboo viscose and microfiber to keep little ones comfortable and dry
Slim construction doesn't add too much bulk
Washes well and reasonably stain resistant
Decent price for a pack of 10
cons: Might need to be paired with a hemp insert for heavy wetters or nighttime use

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent without bulk
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I was looking for something that was absorbent but not bulky. I have been using these for about two weeks now. They definitely need to be doubled for long naps or over nights but work for daytime (2-3 hours). I use them for my one year old and three year old. I had a few concerns in the beginning, but once the insert was fully prepped they worked very well. The customer service is by far the best I have recieved by a cloth diaper company. I hope to try their pocket diapers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: z. zabinski

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started leaking through micro fiber inserts so it was time to search for some more absorbent inserts for our pocket diapers. I washed these a few times but did leak for a bit although I believe it could have been the fit of the diaper and needed to go to the next rise snap. You do have to wash a good amount of times as with any other inserts to get maximum absorbency, have had these for a good amount a time and they hold up very well with our heavy wetter.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.&Mrs. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit thinner then the last ones I bought on Amazon (Alvababy). I guess it's expected cause they were cheaper... They seem to work ok, about as good as the normal microfiber ones. I have to still use 2 liners or else it leakes (I use the all in one diapers,so adding 2 liners is not ok)... I won't be purchasing them again. I fell bad cause the seller even reached out to to me, I'm sure it was a generic email tho.
customer_reviews.author: Toy

customer_reviews.title: No more rash!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered more of these as we are slowly transitioning from disposable to cloth diapers as our gifted supply dwindles. These are a great value for the money. I love that they are made of such gentle material and still very absorbent. The best part is my baby seems so much more comfortable when we use these inside her covers as opposed to disposables. With the disposables she starts to get a little rash and redness, but it goes away within just a couple cloth diapers! In my opinion this is the best option on the market for diaper inserts considering they are so affordable and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Fish

customer_reviews.title: Got the liners ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the liners for a steal on amazon prine day. I have been cloth diapering for two months so far. Love these inserts. They fit great in a flip diaper cover and stick out the back a little on a rumparooz cover (on smallest setting). Love the liners so much I am thinking about buying a diaper set. I am also considering buying more liners at full price. They are soft and absorbent and have not bothered babies skin. They have stained, but I was able to sun them and get the poop stains out.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo_cat

customer_reviews.title: Ammonia smell everyday all day and roughness
customer_reviews.text: These have worked amazingly well for past 4 months but yes seriously a ridiculously strong ammonia smell. Like super strong windex that makes you cough and I'm not usually sensitive to body fluids stuff.Listen to this review...and I've tried various techniques of washing and we use organic products and such and they have increasingly become rough to touch and worn. I am very careful about things I own and use and my child is 7 months old and not rough on the liners. Looking into replacements from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We all sleep longer
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these liners because our 2 month old was wetting through her diaper, clothes, and bedding multiple times a night, even with doubling up her cotton prefolds. They have worked wonderfully and are so easy to use. They make her diapers less bulky so her clothes fit better which makes them easier to get on off for changes. She has started sleeping longer (7+ hours) and we still have no problems with her wetting through. We have had such a great experience with these that we bought more.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Luxa

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to double stuff my Nora’s Nursery diapers at night because we were getting leaks. These work great! They do take a while to dry in the dryer. I have also noticed an odd smell from them after washing them. It’s not a poop or pee smell, kind of like an old milk smell. Not sure if it’s my wash routine or just how they are? But I haven’t had them that long and noticed the smell after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: jessiejess

customer_reviews.title: Quality inserts.
customer_reviews.text: Work well as replacement inserts for cloth diapers. For heavy overnight wetters we will put two of them in. It's not that they lack absorbancy but just that our little man can saturate any type of diaper and cause it to leak. They also appear to hold up very well to bleaching and haven't gotten rough or started piling.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Absorbent, easy to clean, super soft!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love using these inserts for my daughter's cloth diapers! They're so incredibly soft, I just want to rub my face on them all day, and I'm definitely not worried about my daughters skin coming in contact with them! They're very absorbent, I stack one with a MF insert and haven't had a leak since I started using them! They clean up well, and sun out great! I'm going to buy more as I get more diapers! I may go only to the Nora's soon! Love you guys! You have the best inserts!
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with these inserts. They are beautifully made and have held up very well. I was honestly at my wit's end trying to cloth diaper before I found them. After endless leaks, I finally found these absorbent inserts. I've already bought two sets and would recommend them to anyone, especially if you are struggling with CD.
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: Nice inserts.
customer_reviews.text: These are not as absorbent as some of my other inserts, but they are soft and easy to incorporate into the folds that I do with my flat diapers. They're not what I use for over night, just to add some absorbancy during the day. It's easier and more comfortable than doubling up the flat oso cozys we use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I use Alva diapers and these are the inserts I like the best. They hold a lot and seem to wick the moisture away from my baby's skin. They are the same thickness as the 2 microfiber inserts that come with the Alva diapers but they work much better. They easily lay flat inside the pocket diaper whereas the microfiber only inserts seem to be lumpy no matter how much I try to smooth them out and make them flat. I definitely recommend trying these. I haven't had any negative experiences thus far.
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my Best Bottoms brand diapers even though they do not have snaps of coarse. These are very soft, absorbent, and seem very comfortable. My baby is only two months old so does not move around much on his own yet, so I do not know if they will stay in place without the snaps as he begins to crawl. However so far I am much happier with these inserts compared to the Best Bottoms bamboo inserts. They hold up well in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Love these inserts, though for my heavy wetter I did end up purchasing hemp inserts to back these up for longer diapering periods (going shopping or overnight). These are very soft and pretty absorbent. I would definitely recommend these over the standard microfiber inserts that tend to come with pocket diapers.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and holds up very well
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and absorbent. However when my child pees on it more than once it starting to smell with very unpleasant smell. I like that they hold very well. Around 11 months past since u started using them and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Lizaveta

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy again
customer_reviews.text: They don’t hold very much liquid at all. Before you buy know that wi microfiber, these should not touch babies skin directly. Wear with some sort of liner on top unless it’s going into a pocket diaper that has a natural barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Inserts
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these inserts. The regular microfiber inserts that came with our cloth diapers do not do the job that these inserts do. With my heavy-wetting baby, I can use 2 of these in a diaper and there is no overnight leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper inserts I've found
customer_reviews.text: We've been using cloth diapers for years with a few kids. When some of our diapers needed to be retired I purchased Nora's. The diapers also have a lot of adjustment options and the tabs are longer so they have more room for growth, which I appreciate. The patterns are cute, but the diaper inserts are the best! The inserts are SUPER absorbent and they STAY SOFT! They are by far the best diaper inserts I've found, and the price is right. I've started replacing the microfiber inserts from other diapers I own with these.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent liners that will hold up for many babies!
customer_reviews.text: These inserts are pretty easy to clean ! I had to use one inside of the pocket diaper and one outside of the pocket because my little boy is a heavy urinater. The only time they would finally leak is if he slept through the night which I understand why. I still haven't been able to keep a stain in them so that's pretty decent !
customer_reviews.author: Takira Wendel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent absorbency
customer_reviews.text: These are the most absorbent inserts I've found. They also tend to wash cleaner than my other inserts (microfiber and bamboo). Not sure how that works exactly, but I'm not complaining. :) These are the only inserts I'll use now.
customer_reviews.author: Monica StarkoClark

customer_reviews.title: Good Find!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as inserts for Mama Koala diapers that were gifted to us. They work well. Not as thick as the Alvababy inserts we're used to, but they do the trick and are more bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Erica C.

customer_reviews.title: Able to switch out my microfiber inserts with these
customer_reviews.text: Love these inserts. Absorb just like microfiber. Never had a leak yet. I bought enough to replace my microfiber inserts for all my pocket diapers. Only issue is that they are a little wide so they don’t fit perfectly but doesn’t matter and the baby doesn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: sarah robbins

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for GroVila and Thirsties covers.
customer_reviews.text: I use them at night time. My baby is not a heavy wetter but I was tired to use prefolds at night when I am too sleepy. Those are much easier and cheaper that other brands. Good quality. I use GroVia and Thirsties covers.
customer_reviews.author: Doly

customer_reviews.title: best we have bought so far.
customer_reviews.text: we love these best out of 5 comapnies we gave bought from. soft and holds their liquid, washes up great. got them to replace some of the oldest/worst ones we had left from our first child.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Was the hit of the baby shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a baby shower and the second time mom-to-be was VERY excited. She and her husband just didn't look at the package and move on. They stopped and opened the packaging to touch and feel, and then commented on the quality. Not her first rodeo and she was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: leidaho

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing! These are so absorbent, soft, and easy to clean! I have tried a few different inserts and these are by far the best ones yet! I use two inserts per diaper and use baking soda laundry boost, 7th generation soap, vinegar, and oxi clean stain remover to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Small

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these when we first switched to cloth diapers and I'm so glad we did. They have easily become our favorite inserts. Absorbent, easy to clean, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Norton Family

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Use these with a flat and a Thirsties cover for night diapering. Seem to help increase absorption and wick more moisture than plain cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good for daytime!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and absorbent.. though maybe not for a heavier wetter or overnight. We uses something different at nighttime. But these are perfect for the day time!
customer_reviews.author: Bryna Moore

customer_reviews.title: these inserts are great for me
customer_reviews.text: These inserts are soft, which is a plus for my precious baby's skin! I have used them a few times now, and they still come out clean and fresh from the laundry. This is important because I have used other inserts that I never could get clean enough or get the funky smell out of. But so far, these inserts are great for me!
customer_reviews.author: SuSu Bee

customer_reviews.title: Super Absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: I love these diaper inserts. I’ve purchased them twice now. I’m contemplating purchasing one more batch. They absorb really well, wash fabulously with the rest of the diaper laundry, and pairs well with a flour sack towel for extra absorbency. I recommend them to all the other cloth diapering mommas I know!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: 100% WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nora’s Nursery Cloth Diapers! They are seriously so worth the money! I mean come on guys... ONE BOX OF DIAPERS COSTS $25 on average. And it lasts for a month (IF THAT). Spending $50-$100 on Nora’s nursery cloth diapers is going to save you SO MUCH MONEY and it’s better for yours baby bottom and let’s not forget the environment :) Just saying...think about it :)
customer_reviews.author: Krystena

customer_reviews.title: Best inserts available!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Alva cloth diapers off amazon and from their site and the inserts they sell do not come close to the absorbency, softness, and ease that Nora’s provides! I use these inserts in all of my pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: they are wonderful! Very absorbant- no odors
customer_reviews.text: I put inside of our BumGenius pocket diapers (for the 4th child), they are wonderful! Very absorbant- no odors!
customer_reviews.author: Buyerzz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!  Soft and absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: These liners are so soft and wonderful. I love them for my son. I dont stuff them in the diapers, I put between the diaper and my son's skin...the diaper is made of polyester and really irritated his skin so I had to do something. So glad I can use my cloth diaper lot, as long as I have these for liners against his skin! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used bamboo inserts before and I love them! They absorb so well and keep my baby fairly dry. They wash well and feel nice. Mostmicrofiber can be rough on the skin, but these are gentle and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla A

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Insert
customer_reviews.text: These are my FAVORITE diaper inserts! I use them for his night-time diapers with a little microfiber insert, and have not had a leak yet! They are soft and super absorbent, and they don't loose their shape in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Better than other inserts!
customer_reviews.text: I have a variety of cloth diapers with different kinds of inserts. So far these are my favorites. Many of my other liners are microfiber without the bamboo blend, and the feel of them is awful. They catch on every little bit of dry skin when I'm stuffing diapers. It was well worth the money to buy inserts to replace those.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kaler

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The inserts work as promised. I would only make one change. They shift around in the rumparooz I use, I would love a bit of contour to the back especially for poop catching. I know these are pocket diaper inserts, but the option would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great inserts
customer_reviews.text: They work great and I have now been using them for 3 months and they haven't lost any of their absorption ability and they are washed at least once a week. I tend to double up at night because my daughter sleeps through the night
customer_reviews.author: Bryony Lyn Topete

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. Super absorbent and easy to clean. Hardly retains poo smell! Stains was out well, too. I need to buy more to replace my microfiber inserts! They are super soft, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable enough for my ASD child who has sensory issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as intended! Very soft material. It was comfortable enough for my ASD child who has sensory issues so it passed his test.
customer_reviews.author: KrisAlaina

customer_reviews.title: My favorite inserts so far
customer_reviews.text: Some of my favorite diaper inserts. We have tried 5 different types and these ones seem to hold up in the wash the best and do a great job preventing leaks. My daughter is a heavy wetter, so we often have problems with leaks. These have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

customer_reviews.title: They had a wierd smell wen i got them and then they turned black
customer_reviews.text: Im not a fan of these they turned black in some spots after about 5 washes and they stunk wen arriving personally i like the cheap microfiber ones better
customer_reviews.author: Zachary waite

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo liners are amazing and work better than microfiber in my opinion. Just need to wash at least ten times before use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect inserts
customer_reviews.text: I love these inserts! I pair them with the Nora's nursery pocket diapers and they work like a charm. Even all snapped down to the small size they are absorbent and not bulky like so many other.
customer_reviews.author: Tffaye

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be very absorbent and I like how thin they are so they don't add bulk to the diaper. Can't beat the price. Little longer than I like for the small setting on flip diaper but I fold down in front which works out good for my little boy. Once ilengthen the flip it will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Jones

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for! Soft, absorbent, and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: McC Const.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: This was a baby shower gift. Baby not here yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great value, amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these as inserts inside of diaper covers and to boost the Nora’s Nursery pocket diapers I got at my baby shower! Love the quality, and they feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Hoit

customer_reviews.title: and I really like disposables. However
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to cloth diapering, and I really like disposables. However, my daughter's skin does not. Out of the 4 insert brands I have tried, these hold the most, and they're really soft. They're also a little thinner than 3 of the other brands, which my daughter appreciates.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: The size and quality is excellent. These are a new concept for me as ...
customer_reviews.text: The size and quality is excellent. These are a new concept for me as I am the grandma. I love this idea and look forward to ordering more from you.
customer_reviews.author: gudolgal

customer_reviews.title: Excelent for pocket type diapers
customer_reviews.text: You have to wash them a few times to improve absorption and the work fine. The only problem that we had is that we need to use 2 if we don't want leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Dittborn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite inserts yet! My baby can use one for 8 hours overnight with NO leaks and there are no compression leaks when he's in his car seat. I swear by these and refuse to use any others unless unavoidable.
customer_reviews.author: Michaellena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great and work great for the cloth diapers!! And greatly priced! I love how they come in 7 cloth diapers instead of 6 :)! I wish they had more designs especially for boys!!
customer_reviews.author: Gotcha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’ll order more if I need. Soaks up urine after only one or two washes. I like the feel and quality for the money spent
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Jernejcic

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: We just recently tried out pocket diapers and fell in love with Nora’s Nursery. We ordered more inserts because they’re so absorbent that sometimes only the insert needs to be changed. I would absolutely recommend this product to anyone using pocket diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Eryne

customer_reviews.title: Love.love.love.
customer_reviews.text: So far, we've used them about a week, behind our charcoal bamboo, in pocket diapers. My ten month old is a very heavy wetter, these last us all night and could last more(with how were using them). I love these inserts and plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Softest
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are so soft” I will buy these again
customer_reviews.author: laura dawe

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, a little smaller then I was
customer_reviews.text: works well, comfortable, a little smaller then I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect inserts!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my favorite diaper inserts. I keep buying more and replacing prefolds and other miscellaneous inserts! They are comparable to Alva bamboo inserts, but softer and a bit thicker, and definitely more absorbent. So they're squishy but trim, the perfect combo. I use them with TotBots stretchy wraps and Flips for my 7 month old twins. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: mara wood

customer_reviews.title: Happy days ahead!
customer_reviews.text: My step son and daughter-in-law are expecting twins and these were on there wish list. I know how happy they were to receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and absorb great! They fit well in Flip (slightly shorter than the flip inserts) and Wink diaper covers. They have cleaned up easily in the wash and held up well so far - I can't review long term use yet.
customer_reviews.author: BALuis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were very absorbent and great quality. Worked well in our pocket diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Hale

customer_reviews.title: I have another brand of cloth diapers and don’t like the inserts so I bought these to replace them ...
customer_reviews.text: The inserts are so soft and absorbent. I have another brand of cloth diapers and don’t like the inserts so I bought these to replace them because I loved them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Best bamboo inserts I’ve seen yet!!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting them to be SOO fluffy and soft!! I love them! And they are so absorbent as well, makes me wish I had bought more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love these inserts! They are perfect for my baby girls sensitive skin and absorb really well. I do double them up which is just me being cautious, but most the time one will just work.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fast shipping. These inserts are thick and plush. I appreciate when a product is as stated on the site! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Millburg

customer_reviews.title: Best inserts for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: very nice product. Have been using these for my son since 6 months. Better than microfiber inserts for baby's skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavitha

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: They work fine but I had to buy a new set because the absortion is not the same after after using them for about 8 months. But I guess nothing last forever
customer_reviews.author: David Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is leak free! and also no mess with threads.Wish it was just little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ES&Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and very soft, can't wait to use them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam G.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and don't have a funny smell like the microfiber ones do. They are absorbent but I needed to double stuff at night.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are super absorbent! We switched to these from microfiber and I am sooo glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the liners
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They wash up well and absorb well!
customer_reviews.author: Tarbear73

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These inserts are strong for my twins. It doesn't irritate their skin. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed! The inserts are wonderfully soft, they stay just as soft after washing, and you cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are the only inserts I use!
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love these inserts! This is the second batch i have purchased and the are very reliable
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: ... baby as of yet so as far as how great they work that remains to be seen
customer_reviews.text: We have not had the baby as of yet so as far as how great they work that remains to be seen, Exactly as described in the product description though.
customer_reviews.author: amreviews82115

customer_reviews.title: I have a super heavy-wetter here and these absorb wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I have a super heavy-wetter here and these absorb wonderfully. I use one plus the Bumgenius doubler during the day and two at night and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Abby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they were a gift to my sister and she says she absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: LInz

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: No. These went straight to the trash. Non absorbant, tons of compression leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: They are super absorbent, just remember to wash them at least 3 times for optimal absorbency before use. I have a newborn and they are little too long on her, and folding them makes it to be little too bulky than I like it to be so I am waiting to use them once she gets a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love these they fit the entire diaper and work for my Charlie banana diapers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very trim and pair well with other natural fiber inserts
customer_reviews.text: We like to pair these with our hemp/cotton inserts! Very trim and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Nichole rowe

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and company
customer_reviews.text: Soft which makes it nice to stuff with, absorbency seems good so far, and customer service was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lucky mama to have selected Nora's Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Nora's Nursery cloth diapers (which are ah-mazing!) super quality, wash well, repel stains nicely, absorbency is far more efficient than I imagined. // If you're considering cloth diapers -- my recommendation is JUST START!
customer_reviews.author: tana reyna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Of great quality. Super absorbent. Some of the best inserts I have found!
customer_reviews.author: heather Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far!
customer_reviews.text: These a so soft and seen to work pretty well after a few days of use. We bought these to replace the microfiber ones. Will need to update the review after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received the diaper inserts super fast. Very pleased with the quality of them. Will order again from this company in the future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Safe and healthier way for me to diaper my babies! A must have, Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ls

customer_reviews.title: My son still peed through his diaper.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to absolutely love these, and for the first two weeks, I did. Then, the honeymoon was over. My two year old son started peeing through his diaper consistently, no matter what I did or how I washed and dried these inserts. They also stain with baby poop and no matter how I clean them, sun them or dry them, I just can't get the baby poop stains out. It's very disappointing. I think that if you have a kid who doesn't pee or poop a lot at one time, these might work?
customer_reviews.author: Tirado Family

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great, the first time you use a cloth diaper, it is very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Otori

customer_reviews.title: Love the inserts
customer_reviews.text: These inserts are wonderful. I love them, and I would recommend them to anyone who has a baby, and you are using cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Thick, wash well and absorbent. I bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick, wash well and absorbent. I bought a ten pack of extra inserts to supplement my diapers and give extra absorbency when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jona M Bourgard

customer_reviews.title: We've been using these about 2 weeks. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these about 2 weeks. They are absorbent and we've not had any leaks, even overnight. They fit multiple brands of pocket diapers, so go ahead and buy extras!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: ... as an insert for my Flip diaper covers and love them. They keep the diaper covers slim and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these as an insert for my Flip diaper covers and love them. They keep the diaper covers slim and far less bulky than other inserts I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: These are very good!
customer_reviews.text: These inserts absorb well even though they are thin. They also remain flat after washing which my homemade ones did not. I have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reusable Cloth Diaper Inserts for Pocket or Cover Diapers Pack of 10, Washable 4 Layer Bamboo Viscose Microfiber Pocket Nappy Insert, Adjustable Liners Diaper Booster Pads
product_meta.description:
Nora's Nursery is proud to offer this 10 Pack of Bamboo Viscose Inserts!

Our soft, absorbent reusable cloth diaper inserts are made with ecofriendly 4-layer bamboo viscose/ microfiber and get softer and MORE ABSORBENT with every wash. The two outside layers are Bamboo to maintain comfort against your babies bottom and the 2 inner layers are microfiber to absorb moisture and maintain dryness. You won't have to deal with a leaky diaper ever again. These pocket nappy inserts has superb absorbency, soft and comfortable, so you’re not stuffing your child’s diaper so full that they can’t move. Remember that less bulk makes for a more comfortable baby. More absorbency keeps that baby dry longer.

Feature:

=> 4 layers design, the outside 2 layers are bamboo viscose, the inside 2 layers are microfiber. This makes it super absorbent.

=> Easy use and very Soft

=> Machine washable and dryable.

=> Size: For baby weighs 10 to 33 Pounds

=> Dimension of insert: 13" x 5"
feature_bullets: DRY AND COMFORTABLE - These diaper booster pads are designed in 4 layers, the outside 2 layers are made from bamboo viscose, the inside 2 layers are microfiber. This makes it super absorbent, keep your baby dry and comfortable without staining.

DIAPER INSERTS: Bamboo is naturally hypoallergenic and these cloth diaper inserts are reusable and fully machine washable, and become softer and more absorbent the more they are washed. Less expensive than disposable diapers, and reduces landfill waste.

SLEEK ONE SIZE FITS ALL DESIGN - Extremely slim design but maintains great absorbency and can fit most pocket or cover cloth diapers, insert dimension is 13" x 5". No need to stock and store multiple size diaper inserts.
ECONOMICAL & ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY: Disposable baby diaper inserts are expensive, these reusable, super-absorbent inserts are an ideal choice.
NO COMPRESSION LEAKS: Gussets contour to fit better and prevent leaking.
